config.instructions:
To use Trello with MCPFusion, you need a Trello API Key and Token.

1. Visit https://trello.com/power-ups/admin/ to get your API Key
2. Click 'Generate a Token' link on that page to get your Token
3. Enter both values when prompted below

fields.name: key
fields.label: API Key
fields.description: Your Trello API Key from https://trello.com/power-ups/admin/

endpoints.name: Get Member
endpoints.description: Get information about a member (user). Use 'me' as the memberId to get the authenticated user's profile. This is a good way to test connectivity and authentication.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Member ID or 'me' for the authenticated user

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include (e.g., 'fullName,username,email,url,avatarUrl')

endpoints.name: Search Trello
endpoints.description: Search for boards, cards, members, and organizations across Trello

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query string. Supports operators like @member, #label, board:name, list:name, is:open, is:archived, has:attachments, due:day

parameters.name: modelTypes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of model types to search (default: all)

parameters.name: cards_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of cards to return (1-1000)

parameters.name: boards_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of boards to return (1-1000)

parameters.name: partial
parameters.description: Whether to allow partial matching
